name: market for anaerobic digestion plant, for biowaste | anaerobic digestion plant, for biowaste | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9226/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'anaerobic digestion plant, for biowaste', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of anaerobic digestion plant, for biowaste. It has a yearly capacity of 10,000 tons, a building lifetime of 25 years and a stationary machines lifetime of 10 years.The process includes the infrastructure for the pre-treatment process, digestion of bio-waste and the succsesive treatment of the fermented material (de-watering and post composting).

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Waste Treatment & Recycling
